name: archive-bot
description: An app for automatically re-posting messages approaching the 90 day limit, backing up channels to external sources.

scripts.preinstall: npm run make-executable && npm run venv && npm run py-deps
scripts.test: coverage run --branch --source=src --omit=test_*.py -m pytest && npm run coverage
